Explosion at Hebei, China, restaurant injures several people, state media reportsSeveral people were injured after a strong explosion destroyed a restaurant in Hebei province in China, badly damaging cars and leaving large debris scattered on surrounding streets, Chinese state media reported on Wednesday. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 02:42:34 GMT CSLH3BQMAVIVMGJSSN4KQRTVI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/explosion-hebei-china-restaurant-injures-several-people-state-media-reports-2024-03-13/Reuters世界中国
Stocks stride past US inflation to milestone highsAsian shares notched seven month highs on Wednesday, on the back of record peaks on Wall Street, as investors mostly shrugged off slightly hotter-than-expected U.S. inflation, betting it won't derail interest rate cuts expected by the middle of the year. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 02:16:26 GMT TGDW5DOZUVIFJHIKD5BZDYVHP4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-wrapup-1-2024-03-13/Tom Westbrook市场
Chinese EV giant BYD launches new version of e2 hatchback with lower starting priceChinese electric vehicle giant BYD on Wednesday launched a new version of e2 EV hatchback with a lower starting price than its predecessor. Sports and music lessons for China's kids in sharp decline as purse strings tightenLast August, Zhang Zhaolin pulled her 10-year-old son out of soccer classes that he loved after she was laid off from her job at a Chinese internet firm. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 01:13:35 GMT VPTL6SMJKRKXZIX7YW2XJF4M6A https://www.reuters.com/world/china/sports-music-lessons-chinas-kids-sharp-decline-purse-strings-tighten-2024-03-13/Sophie Yu, Anne Marie Roantree世界中国
Country Garden onshore bondholders have not received coupon payment, news site reportsCountry Garden's onshore bondholders said they have not received a coupon payment due on Tuesday, Chinese digital news outlet thepaper.cn reported. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 01:07:28 GMT E72XAILVNBJN3K3AI2JCSQ4TMA https://www.reuters.com/business/country-garden-onshore-bondholders-have-not-received-coupon- payment-news-site-2024-03-13/Reuters商业
Global electric car sales in February hurt by China's New Year celebrationsGlobal sales of fully electric and plug-in hybrid vehicles (PHEVs) rose at a tepid rate of 3% in February versus the same period last year mainly due to the impact of the Chinese Lunar New Year celebrations, market research firm Rho Motion said on Wednesday. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 00:03:32 GMT ILVXTVNPGNJ2RN6INTA5MLZDOM https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/global-electric-car-sales-february-hurt-by-chinas-new-year-celebrations-2024-03-13/Nick Carey商业汽车与交通
